      • GeoPoint

        public GeoPoint(double longitude,
                double latitude)
        Creates a GeoPoint
        Parameters:
        longitude, - the longitude of the point in radians
        latitude, - the latitude of the point in radians
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the longitude is not between -PI and +PI or if the latitude is not between -PI/2 and +PI/2
